description: A minimal CSV parser utility for client-side previews, supporting configurable delimiters, quoted fields, headers, and trimming. Provides a public function `parseCsv` for parsing CSV text into headers and rows.

methods.name: parseCsv(text, { delimiter = ',', header = true, limitRows = 100 } = {})
methods.description: Parses CSV text into an object containing headers and rows, with options for delimiter, header presence, and row limit.

ctags.name: parseCsv
ctags.pattern: /^export function parseCsv(text, { delimiter = ',', header = true, limitRows = 100 } = {}) {$/
